await tx.wait();
const tx = await contract.connect(user1).deposit({value: ethers.parseEther("1.0")});
// Make a deposit of 1 ETH
const [owner, user1] = await ethers.getSigners();
// Get accounts
const contract = await AuctionVault.attach("0x5FbDB2315678afecb367f032d93F642f64180aa3");
const AuctionVault = await ethers.getContractFactory("AuctionVault");
// Get the contract
